rows.label: tev024701_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire

rows.label: tev024701_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Samanya about the industrial district.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024701_JNK0020
rows.name: Discuss[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024701_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Samanya if she has any interesting news.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024701_SEL0031
rows.name: Ask Samanya about the west gate.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024701_SEL0041
rows.name: Ask Samanya about her experience with the Ma-non.

rows.label: tev024701_SEL0051
rows.name: Ask Samanya about the Ganglion attack.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024701_SEL0061
rows.name: Ask Samanya if she's heard any interesting rumors.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024701_SEL0071
rows.name: Ask Samanya what she intends to do next.

rows.label: tev024701_SEL1021
rows.name: Ask Samanya about recent developments.

rows.label: tev024701_MSG0001
rows.name:
If you ride that elevator over there to the top,
you'll find a beautiful overlook of the entire city.
Have you been up there yet? It's pretty incredible.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024701_MSG0002
rows.name:
Whenever I see New LA's strength and beauty unfold
before me like that, it always inspires me to work that
much harder at my job.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024701_MSG0003
rows.name:
I want to make New LA every bit the city the real
Los Angeles was.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024701_MSG0004
rows.name:
I'll do my part, but I'll be counting on you BLADEs to
protect this city and the bright future it holds.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024701_MSG0008
rows.name:
BLADEs have found shipping containers and debris
from the White Whale scattered all over Mira.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024701_MSG0009
rows.name:
I helped build the White Whale, you know.
And watching those xenoforms send it crashing down
in pieces was...horrible.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024701_MSG0010
rows.name: It was like my own limbs were being torn off.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024701_MSG0011
rows.name:
But seeing its remnants be recovered and recycled has
helped to heal the wound somewhat.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024701_MSG0012
rows.name:
If you have business outside the city, I hope you'll help
us find the remains of the ship that we spent so many
years building.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024701_MSG0020
rows.name:
They've finally reopened the west gate.
Now we can come and go without having to pass
through the emergency exit.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024701_MSG0021
rows.name:
What a relief! Bringing materials into the city without
an operational west gate has been a major hassle.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024701_MSG0022
rows.name:
If you're going to do any exploring to the west,
you should head straight out the gate from now on.
It's much more convenient that way.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev024701_MSG0027
rows.name:
A Ma-non named Jubietta showed up at my door and
told me she wanted to work with me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev024701_MSG0028
rows.name:
She said that back in Oblivia, she was rescued
by a human named [ST:playername ],
and this was her way of saying thanks.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev024701_MSG0029
rows.name:
But after every 15 or so minutes of work,
she always gets tired and takes a "pizza break."[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev024701_MSG0030
rows.name:
If she's doing this out of gratitude, you'd think she'd
put a little more effort into the work...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev024701_MSG0035
rows.name:
The White Whale was equipped with a high-powered
energy shield designed to protect the entirety of the
Habitat, as this residential unit was known.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev024701_MSG0036
rows.name:
If we still had that, there's no way the enemy could
have gotten in here so easily.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev024701_MSG0037
rows.name:
But if wishes were horses, beggars would ride, eh?
...That's a weird saying, now that I think about it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev024701_MSG0038
rows.name:
Anyway, all we can do is try to compensate for such
losses as best we can. So I'm going to make sure to
get those defensive walls back in perfect condition![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev024701_MSG0039
rows.name:
Still, the best way to compensate for the shield's
absence is to have you BLADEs remove the threat of
the Ganglion completely. I wish you the best of luck.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev024701_MSG0045
rows.name:
There's been a rash of incidents involving the sudden
disappearance of trash that had been stored at base
camps throughout Primordia.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev024701_MSG0046
rows.name:
Of course, since it's only garbage that's being taken,
there's no real harm done.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev024701_MSG0047
rows.name:
Still, we've heard disturbing reports that masked
xenoforms have been spotted...running off with it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev024701_MSG0048
rows.name:
I worry that if we don't get to the bottom of this soon,
it might develop into something that actually IS a
problem.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev024701_MSG0049
rows.name:
We may need to install more data probes throughout
Primordia in hopes of getting footage of one of these
incidents as it happens.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev024701_MSG0055
rows.name:
The threat posed by the Ganglion has been negated,
and the Lifehold Core has been recovered.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev024701_MSG0056
rows.name:
The time has finally come to turn our attention to
building a sustainable life for ourselves here on Mira.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev024701_MSG0057
rows.name:
This would be so much easier if the White Whale
had been able to survive its crash landing intact.
But there's no use crying over spilled milk.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev024701_MSG0058
rows.name:
With the assistance of the Ma-non, I'm confident that
we'll be able to build a comfortable city for ourselves.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024701_MSG1001
rows.name:
It's well established that the fumes emitted by painting
and waterproofing are not good for our mimeosomes.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024701_MSG1002
rows.name:
It's been difficult finding ways to protect our laborers
from their deleterious effects.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024701_MSG1003
rows.name:
Fortunately, the Zaruboggan have volunteered to help
by detoxifying things every night.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024701_MSG1004
rows.name:
I am in awe of the strange powers they possess.
No matter how tough the job, they always manage
to have it completely detoxified by the next morning.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024701_MSG1005
rows.name:
How I wish Jubietta could learn from their diligence
instead of spending most of her workday eating one
pizza after another.[ST:wait ]
